forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 46. Southeast wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. North northwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, a chill hangs in the air, woven with the promise of a pleasantly bright day ahead. A mix of partly cloudy skies presides, painting the horizon with a soft palette, while the cooling breeze whispers reminders of the night’s lingering briskness. With temperatures settling around the mid to high fifties, the atmosphere is crisp yet inviting—a fleeting glimpse of warmth looms on the horizon as the sun attempts to break through.

Visibility remains clear for now, the marine layer keeping its distance, although hints of fog may still linger in the outer areas, clinging to the edges of the Bay. This clarity promises a day spent favorably outdoors, where a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero could unveil the vibrancy of city life awakening. Dress in layers, donning a light sweater over a long-sleeve shirt to embrace the cool morning air, yet be prepared to shed them when the sun asserts its warmth in the afternoon. It’s a day to draw breath, observe, and find joy in the mundane—a perfect time to sip a warm cup of coffee while exploring the local artisan markets or allowing your feet to wander through the serene parks, soaking in the serene ambience the city effortlessly radiates.
